title: Ross Bicycle font
content:
Can anyone identify this font from a Ross Custom bicycle? Suggest anything similar?

[http://www.blackrockcycle.com/ImageFetch.ashx?picNum=1&Size=2&ImageID=2653](http://web.archive.org/web/20091217193404/http:/www.blackrockcycle.com/ImageFetch.ashx?picNum=1&Size=2&ImageID=2653)
author: NancyPK

comments.content: Like Ross said, its custom lettering, most likely. Doubtless it is based on a font, though. Notice how the two ’o’s are slightly different - and the third s seems to bulge more than the others. Nice bike!
